RATING 5.0 MCDonalds American, Fast Food 6002 Slide Rd, Lubbock (806) 793-1426 LATEST REVIEW This is the best McDonalds in Lubbock! Of course I have gotten my order messed up, but thats with every fast food resturant. The employees are overally friendly and the place is always clean. Great Great Great Resturant!!! REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 3.5 Chez Suzette French, Italian, Fast Food 4423 50th Street, Lubbock (806) 795-6796 DESCRIPTION Serving French and Italian cuisine at a moderate price. Wine, beer and mixed drinks are available. Open for lunch Tuesday through Saturday 11:30 to 2:00 and for dinner Monday through Saturday at 5:30 until 10:00. LATEST REVIEW My husband and I always rely on Chez Suzette when celebrating a special event. The food is superb and is a nice break away from the usual chains found around Lubbock. We highly recommend the Chateau Briand, although it does require 24 hours notice, t... REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 1.0 Dennys American, Fast Food, Breakfast 4718 Slide Rd, Lubbock (806) 793-9594 LATEST REVIEW I am writing this review to inform potential customers, that though the food is good, and the establishment is over all an excellent family restaurant, as a customer you must at all times guard your personal and private items. REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
